title: HVAC and ventilation inspection certificates
dataVerified: Building address, HVAC system details, inspector, air quality test results
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake HVAC certificates. Domain binding verifies inspector. Indoor air quality compliance. ASHRAE standards. COVID-19 ventilation verification. Energy code compliance.
